constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 90 (Tuesday, May 24, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DeLAURO:
H.R. 7864
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the United States Constitution and its
subsequent amendments, and further clarified and interpreted
by the Supreme Court of the United States.
[Page H5214]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Physician Education for Fistula Treatment Act
